name: Henry David Thoreau
notable_ideas: Abolitionism, tax resistance, development criticism, civil disobedience, conscientious objector
influences: Plotinus, Indian philosophy, Ralph Waldo Emerson, Virgil, Goethe, Thomas Carlyle
influenced: Mahatma Gandhi, John F. Kennedy, Martin Luther King, Jr., Leo Tolstoy, Marcel Proust, William Butler Yeats, Sinclair Lewis, John Zerzan, Ernest Hemingway, Andrew Martinez, Upton Sinclair, Emma Goldman, Émile Armand, E. B. White, E. O. Wilson, B. F. Skinner, George Bernard Shaw, Christopher McCandless
